properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO ,USER_ID ,USER_PWD ,USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BIRTH_DATE ,NICKNAME ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,ADDRESS ,ADDRESSDETAIL ,GENDER ,TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DATE ,TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MODIFY_DATE ,USER_TYPE ,USER_PATH FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND USER_STATUS = 'Y'
